surface module¶

This module contains surfaces for snake game

class surface.InfoString(scene, sw)¶

Bases: object

This class describes the information string.

METHODS

InfoString.up_score()

InfoString.draw()

InfoString.get_size()

InfoString.get_score() |

ATTRIBUTES

h: int¶
The height of information string.
w: int¶
The width of information string.
size: tuple¶
The tuple like (w, h)
score: int = 0¶
The current score.
color: tuple = 255, 255, 0¶
The color of drawing information.

draw(scene)¶

This method renders the information line. :param object scene: The scene for rendering food (pygame.display).


get_score()¶

This method returns the score.

Returns

score

Return type

int


get_size()¶

This method returns the width and the height of the info string.

Returns

size

Return type

tuple(int, int)


up_score(value)¶

This method increases score.

Parameters

value (int) – The value of increasing score.

ATTRIBUTES

self.__x0: int¶
The initial X coordinate of playing ground.
self.__y0: int¶
The initial Y coordinate of playing ground.
self.__x: int¶
The final X coordinate of playing ground.
self.__y: int¶
The final Y coordinate of playing ground.
pos: tuple((int, int), (int, int))¶
The tuple, which contains initial and final coordinates of
playing ground.
w: int¶
The play ground width.
h: int¶
The play ground height.

This method returns the coordinates of playing ground.

the tuple, which contains initial and final coordinates.
